name: PianWHOA!
body:
### About
PianWHOA! is a virtual piano with a tutor mode programmed in C++ using QT Creator. This project was created by Emilie Menard Barnard(@embarnard), Brittany Berin(@bmbritt10), Bernice Chen, and Kristen Morse for CS 48 at UC Santa Barbara in Winter 2011.

### Download Instructions
Download the .tar or .zip file and save to your computer. Consult the [QT downloads page](http://qt-project.org/downloads) and download the appropriate version of the QT library (this is necessary for PianWHOA! to run). Then open the Piano1.app file to start playing!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
